thread.title: adidas Originals x White Mountaineering Continues With Experimental Superstar Slip-On
thread.title_full: adidas Originals x White Mountaineering Continues With Experimental Superstar Slip-On

author: Graeme Campbell
title: adidas Originals x White Mountaineering Continues With Experimental Superstar Slip-On
text:
Visit the original post to see all 6 images from this gallery. 
Following up recent NMD and EQT 93-17 unveilings, adidas Originals’ relationship with Japanese label White Mountaineering continues to bear fruit. With balmy spring days on the horizon, the pair come together again, this time for a lightweight, utilitarian reboot of the iconic Superstar model.
Titled the “Injection” pack, the sneaker comes sans laces and features a breathable Primeknit upper clad with white geometric stripes. Additional touches include the traditional shell toe cap, premium nubuck accents on the heel and White Mountaineering branding on the lateral rear.
The adidas Originals by White Mountaineering SS17 injection pack launches February 24 online and in selected retailers.
For more slip on action, check out this penny loafer-inspired Acapulco .
